issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: If the sink init fails (such as because the HDFS cluster isn't running) on a non-secure cluster, the init will throw an NPE because of missing properties.
fields.summary: RollingFileSystemSink can throw an NPE on non-secure clusters

comments.body: This patch should be better.  I also rolled in a lazy initialization of the HDFS connection.
